name: Crystalis (itch) (Bardon)
description:
You are Arthur and adventurer. The son of the king is disappeared and you want to find him. In towns you can buy better equipments, got to taverns or let you heal or pray in temples. In the wilderness and dungeons are monsters, when you defeat them you get money and experience. When you have enough experience you raise a rank. There are two dungeons. 

Control is with keyboard (w,a,s,d for moving,in menues-->1,2,3 or a,b,c, x-->exit)  and mouse
